comments.author: Gerald Wells
comments.content: Really love your most recent photo. I've been trying to capture the same thing for a few months and would love some tips!

comments.author: Natali Romanova
comments.content: A fast 50mm like f1.8 would help with the bokeh. I've been using primes as they tend to get a bit sharper images.

comments.author: Gerald Wells
comments.content: Thank you! That was very helpful!
